sector.narrative: Humanitarian planning and review activities (HRP, RRP, UNICEF HAC)

title.narrative: Chile United Nations Development Assistance Framework
UNICEF Programmes in Chile (Communication and mobilization)
UNICEF Programmes in Chile (Crisis and Emergencies)

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: The CO participated in the Task Force for the organization-wide revision of Core Commitment for Children, and in the field test, providing inputs from the unique perspective of a non-emergency, high¬-income country with strong public institutions capacity, to ensure that the revised CCC applies to all contexts where UNICEF works. EPP was kept updated throughout the year. With the transfer of the coordination of Concausa from the CO to LACRO in 2018, the CO formed an alliance with América Solidaria Chile to support the local version of Concausa “Revoluciona Concausa,” raising the profile of adolescents in Chile. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:20/01/2020

title.narrative: Number of articles/stories with UNICEF mentions in top-tier media outlets
Number of followers across all UNICEF social media channels
